definition: pitfall/trap/to get stuck/to sink/to cave in/to frame (false charge)/to capture (a city in battle)/to fall (to the enemy)/defect

sentences.english: Ground collapse is a common geological hazard in shallow buried karst area.
sentences.chinese: 地面塌陷是淺埋岩溶區常見的一種地質災害。

sentences.english: Collapse distribution centres on the intensive runoff zones.
sentences.chinese: 在地下水強徑流帶，塌陷分佈較爲密集。

sentences.english: Water inched its way up the steps as first as first-floor outside walls collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 當一樓外牆塌陷時水慢慢地沿着臺階漫了上來。

sentences.english: Collapse of mined-out area in coal mines is the chief geologic disaster in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 煤礦採空塌陷是山西省地質災害的主要災種。

sentences.english: With the technics of purdah infusion to stem water, surface sinking of large area can be prevented.
sentences.chinese: 採用帷幕注漿堵水工藝可防止大面積地表塌陷的發生。

sentences.english: In recent years, karst collapses have frequently occurred in Zaozhuang City.
sentences.chinese: 近年來棗莊市岩溶塌陷頻繁發生。

sentences.english: Collapse of mined-out area is an environmental geological hazard of the coal mining area.
sentences.chinese: 採空區塌陷屬於煤礦區的環境地質災害問題。

sentences.english: People fled toward the Sumida River, drowning by the hundreds when bridges collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 人們都逃向隅田川，當橋塌陷時淹死了幾百人。

sentences.english: Excavate coal subsided water area is the special component of the surface water in Huainan.
sentences.chinese: 採煤塌陷水域已成爲淮南市礦區一種特殊的地表水體。

sentences.english: The ground gave in under the weight of the heavy car.
sentences.chinese: 地面在沉重的汽車的重壓下塌陷了。

sentences.english: Rescue workers should know how to locate and search these voids .
sentences.chinese: 救援人員應知道如何定位和搜尋這些塌陷空腔。

sentences.english: Mining induced collapses are widely distributed at karst water filled mining areas in our country.
sentences.chinese: 採礦誘發的塌陷在我國岩溶充水礦區廣泛分佈。

sentences.english: The roadbed of a 300-metre section rail in Qianjiang city collapsed on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五，潛江市300米長的鐵路路基塌陷。

sentences.english: Eventually, the necrotic bone collapses, distorting the overlying articular cartilage and producing secondary osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 骨塌陷，扭曲疊壓關節軟骨從而產生繼發性骨關節炎。

sentences.english: The masonry facing of the embankment was destroyed seriously by stormy waves.
sentences.chinese: 圍壩上游幹砌石護坡在風浪淘刷下，發生嚴重塌陷。

sentences.english: Shuicheng County is one of the most serious karst collapse regions.
sentences.chinese: 水城是貴州最嚴重的岩溶塌陷區之一。

definition: to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
Shenkeng township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
talus slide/to crumble (of scree slope)/to collapse/landslide
